content:
BookmarkOptions Enum

Definition

Specifies the options for a Bookmark.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum BookmarkOptions
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
BookmarkOptions

Fields

MultipleResume

A Bookmark that can be resumed multiple times.
NonBlocking

A Bookmark that does not block the workflow.
None

Default Bookmark options,
